email.title: Email Preferences
email.build-desc: Get notified when a build fails
email.crash-desc: Get notified when a deploy crashes

beta.title: Beta
beta.description: Open to get early access to new features

plan.serverless: You can only deploy serverless functions on this plan.

payment-method.title: Payment Method
payment-method.no-payment-method: You haven’t set up a payment method yet. Bind a payment method to upgrade your plan. You can also get some credits for subscription and usage fees.
payment-method.card-payment-method: You have bind a paymend method of credit card ends in
payment-method.alipay-payment-method: You have bind a paymend method of

credit.title: Account Credit
credit.description: You will not be charged until the credit is empty.

get-credits-modal.title: Get More Credits
get-credits-modal.desc:
Zeabur offers a way to buy prepaid credits if you don't have a credit card or want to pay in advance.
You can use your credits to upgrade your plan and pay for your subscription and usage fees.

recharge-records.title: Recharge Records
recharge-records.description: This is a list of all the recharges you have made.

invoice.title: Next Billing
invoice.invoice_desc_1: This is a preview of the invoice that will be billed on
invoice.invoice_desc_2: . It may change if the subscription is updated.

unsubscribe.description: By downgrading to the Serverless Plan, you will no longer incur any charges. However, your currently deployed Containerized services will be automatically suspended by the system.
unsubscribe.reason-placeholder: Please tell us why you are unsubscribing
unsubscribe.refund-description: Do you require a refund? If you are willing to spend 10 minutes to discuss your reasons for unsubscribing with our team, we would be happy to assist you with a refund!
unsubscribe.contact: We will contact you in 24 hours via email. Please check your inbox.

unbind.title: Unbind Payment Method
unbind.description: If you want to change a payment method, you can unbind it here. Please notice that if you don’t have a valid payment method, your subscription will be canceled automatically and your service will be interrupted.

usage.title: Usage
usage.balance_desc: Balance is the amount of money you have in your account. You can use it to pay for your services.
usage.credit_desc: You will get credits of US$ 5 each month. Your services usage will be deducted from credits first.
usage.usage_desc: The usage history for each project is here

referrals.title: Referrals
referrals.sub-title: Share your link to earn credits
referrals.description-1: By referring your friends, you may earn credits to use on Zeabur.
referrals.description-2: For each friend you refer, you will receive $5 in credits when they upgrade to a paid plan.

pending.title: Pending referrals
pending.no-pending:
No pending referrals.
Refer your friends to earn credit.
